main event: A round, bright orange-red object approximately 30 feet in diameter was observed moving at a high speed on a straight line course of 057 degrees for 45 seconds.
interesting points: The object moved into the view of the witnesses from the northwest and was traveling on a straight line course.
The object was moving at a terrific rate of speed, estimated from its course of 057 degrees.
The viewing time of the object was 45 seconds.
The object was observed by multiple witnesses near the Potomac River in Great Falls, Virginia.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear with 12 miles of visibility and 10 knot winds from the 330 degree direction.
sighted object: a round, bright orange-red object approximately 30 feet in diameter
